author: philngo
content: Hey all! We have a timeslot for Devconnect in Istanbul on Nov 18! Please signal here if you have a presentation you'd like to make so we can create an agenda for the day's activities. Presentations that qualify for inclusion include projects/research relating to the advancement and use cases of the light client protocol on Ethereum. Ticketing information to be posted on (https://lightclients.xyz) and on Twitter (https://twitter.com/EthLightClients) as we get closer to the actual event.

author: seunlanlege
content: Would be interested in presenting this
